body_html:
If it haven't fixed, maybe cpp-package of mxnet can ease your pain, you could use mmdnn to convert models of tensorflow to mxnet. Sumit Kshirsagar <notifications@github.com> 於 2018年10月12日 週五 下午12:23寫道：
…
Is this issue fixed for cmake build root too. Because I would like to use c++ api of tensorflow and include tensorflow as a standalone library in my project? — You are receiving this because you commented. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#1924 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABt-urhk2hmLiIgixt4XWj8cVjuIBvHCks5ukBlCgaJpZM4IGofv> .

could use mmdnn to convert models of tensorflow to mxnet.

body:
If it haven't fixed, maybe cpp-package of mxnet can ease your pain, you
could use mmdnn to convert models of tensorflow to mxnet.

Sumit Kshirsagar <notifications@github.com> 於 2018年10月12日 週五 下午12:23寫道：

> Is this issue fixed for cmake build root too. Because I would like to use
> c++ api of tensorflow and include tensorflow as a standalone library in my
> project?
>
> —

> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
